Title: SM - User-External Interface -Export the EPollbook data file

Test Steps.Step Action:
Precondition:                                                                                                              User is logged in to the system as State UserThere are more than one elections for the selected county                                             In election there is one or more than one polling place associated with precincts.
There are voters for the selected county
Precincts are associated with districts and street segments.                                    Voters are associated with street segments which is selected in precincts.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on System Management> Features/Users> External Interfaces Search
Test Steps.Step Expected: Schedule button is displayed in the bottom right
External Interface Programmer page is displayed succesfully

Test Steps.Step Action: In the types of interfaces select ePollbook Export
Test Steps.Step Expected: User gets to see the Parameters
Start button is disabled by default
User gets to see the information selected

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill in the required information properly:1-Select the Election Date and Name.2-Check all three options:Polling PlaceStreet InformationVoter Information3-Check the checkbox for "Include 17-year-old voters who will be 18 by."Enter an invalid date in the "Age 18 By Date" field to test validation.
Test Steps.Step Expected: User gets to see the fields selected
Job ePollBookExportJob launched successfully ,Job Grid is updated with the status CompletedSystem will add an audit record on DB with the Job Status\n

Test Steps.Step Action: User can Naviagte to the S3 Bucket to download the File , Click on Download
Test Steps.Step Expected: User gets to see                                                       1.The file in format .zip is downloaded Named as (County_ElectionDate_ElectionName Election Year_)                                                                              3. The file is in .txt format                                   4.The name of the file is                 POLLING_PLACE_DATA.txt                                                               STREET_Data.txt                                                                          VOTER_INFO.txt
\n
\n
\n

Title: 88540 - SM - Epoll Book Export Voter when User logged as State User IA (not yet implemented)

Test Steps.Step Action:
Preconditions 
User is logged in to the system as State User
There are more than one elections for the selected county
There are voters for the selected county
Voters have different Precincts assigned
Voters have different Districts assigned
Voters have the Party defined
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n
User options are listed as buttons
External Interfaces Search page is displayed
External Interfaces Scheduler is opened

Test Steps.Step Action: On Interfaces Type Dropdown select Voter Export for Poll Book
Test Steps.Step Expected: Parameters options are displayed
\n

Test Steps.Step Action: //Default County should be displayed, how is defined default counties for the user when is logged as State User?
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n
Elections Date/Name Dropdown is updated with the elections for the selected county
Precinct Type and District Type will be enabled
Precinct Name dropdown is populated with the corresponding data
Export Data button is enabled
District Name dropdown is populated with the corresponding data
Export Data Button is enabled

Test Steps.Step Action: On the Political Party dropdown select the political Party
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: //Where is defined the Party Organization? On Voters page I only see Political Party
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: On the Party Organizations select the corresponding Party Organizations
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: //Question: When the start button is pressed, User will remain in the same page or will be send back to External Interface Search Page to see job status?
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n
Following message is displayed "Export initiated successfully"

Test Steps.Step Action: System will add an audit record on DB with the Job Status
Test Steps.Step Expected: Record is added
Jobs Grid is updated with the process status In Progress

Following message is displayed "Export completed successfully"
Job Grid is updated with the status Completed
System will add an audit record on DB with the Job Status
,txt File is generated
.txt Voters File is there
Confirm there are no headersConfirm data format is equal to the format provided
Data in the file meets selection criteria
